verbose_text: In both HepG2 and L02 compounds activated p53; increased the expressions of p21, p27, Bax, Caspase-3, Caspase-8, Caspase-9 and apoptosis inducing factor, mitochondrion associated 1 (AIFM1); decreased the expressions of Bcl-2, cyclin A, CDK2, cyclin E and cyclin D1.
evidence: expressions of Bcl-2, cyclin A, CDK2, cyclin E
